name: Planet Nanadoo: Quest for the Powered Fruit
name_original: Planet Nanadoo: Quest for the Powered Fruit
description: Oh no! You've crash landed on an unexplored planet and your power source is depleted- and getting even lower by the minute! Go find the beacon to call for help and look for power sources so you can survive until your team finds you and rescues you! And while you're out there, you might want to be cautious of the locals, they might not take well to unexpected intruders...
